info.readme:
Smart Blog is a blog package designed for Umbraco and has been created using MVC. The main purpose of this product is to use as a blog starter kit and also to teach people who are struggling with MVC.
Don't forget to vote up if you like this blog so others know that you've found it useful.
Please note, SmartBlog v1 is designed for Umbraco websites running version 4.10.0 to version 6.0.6 please install fam fam icons from the repository if you're using v1. SmartBlog v2 is designed for Umbraco 7 and upwards, no other packages are required for it.
Smart Blog is distributed under the MIT license which means it can be used for free and distributed in other works.
Changes in version 2.2.1: - Fixed mvc reference problem.
Changes in version 2.2.0: - Removed web service. - Comments now make use of a SurfaceController instead of a web service. - Archive added to right aside. - Fixed issue with Author list in aside. - Comments no longer auto update every 30 seconds, a page refresh is required. - Updated management dashboard interface to use content service.
Changes in version 2.1.0: - Now using IPublishedContent. - Fixed issue with missing properties. - General performance improvements.
Changes in version 2.0.9: - Fixed issues where some properties would not be found. - Upgraded post filtering. - Changed post list ordering to descending. - Fixed issue where in some cases comments would break. - Performance improvements in post listing.
Changes in version 2.0.7: - Fixed issue where categories wouldn't filter post listing.
New in version 2.0.6 - Ability to disable Facebook integration on the comment form. - Fixed issue where management console wouldn't load for some users.
Changes in version 2.0.5: - Added fix for missing property in category list.
Changes in version 2.0.4: - Fixed breadcrumb ordering issue. - Fixed invalid property name in categories. - Ordered tags (most popular first). - Fixed invalid property name in RSS feed and improved performance. - Fixed issue where month has no template

Info.Name: SmartBlog Master
Info.Description: The master document type, all document types should inherit from this.

GenericProperty.Name: Hide from menu
GenericProperty.Description: Use this property if you want to hide this page from every menu.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable Sub Navigation
GenericProperty.Description: Disables sub-navigation from this page in the menu.

GenericProperty.Name: URL Name
GenericProperty.Description: If you want to change the URL of the node without changing the node name fill this in.

GenericProperty.Name: URL Alias
GenericProperty.Description: Use this to give a node multiple URLs.

GenericProperty.Name: Internal Redirect
GenericProperty.Description: Pick a node you want to redirect this page to an internal page.

GenericProperty.Name: External Redirect
GenericProperty.Description: Redirect this page to an external URL.

Info.Name: Page
Info.Description: Not to be used within the content tree structure. This document type is only to provide properties to child document types.

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: The page title text.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary
GenericProperty.Description: The page summary text.

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: The text to display within the page title tags.

GenericProperty.Name: Keywords
GenericProperty.Description: The keywords to place within the page keywords tag.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: The text to place within the page description tags.

Info.Name: Article
Info.Description: Use this type of document if you just want to have a generic text page.

GenericProperty.Name: Body
GenericProperty.Description: The main body text to display on this post.

Info.Name: Comment
Info.Description: Use this type of document to store comments under a blog post. Comments will be displayed within its parent post page.

GenericProperty.Name: Name
GenericProperty.Description: The name of the person who posted the comment.

GenericProperty.Name: Email
GenericProperty.Description: The email address of the person who made the comment.

GenericProperty.Name: Website
GenericProperty.Description: The website address of the person who made this comment.

GenericProperty.Name: Comment
GenericProperty.Description: The comment text.

Info.Name: Date
Info.Description: Use this type of document to store your posts by date, this is the preferred method of storing posts.

Info.Name: Folder
Info.Description: Use this type of document to create a clean content tree structure.

Info.Name: Month
Info.Description: Use this type of document to store your posts by date, this is the preferred method of storing posts.

Info.Name: Post
Info.Description: Use this type of document to create posts within a blog. Comments can be created underneath it.

GenericProperty.Name: Author
GenericProperty.Description: The name of the author of this post. (Try to avoid spelling mistakes because all author names will be listed on the right side of the blog.)

GenericProperty.Name: Date
GenericProperty.Description: The date and time this post was created.

GenericProperty.Name: Category
GenericProperty.Description: The categories this post falls under.

GenericProperty.Name: Tags
GenericProperty.Description: Tags associated with this post.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable Comments
GenericProperty.Description: Disables comments for this post, existing comments will not be shown.

Info.Name: RSS
Info.Description: Generally there should only be one RSS feed per blog but this may not always be the circumstance. Use this type of document to provide an RSS feed of your blog.

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: The title of this RSS feed.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: The description of this RSS feed.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description: The image to associate with this RSS feed.

GenericProperty.Name: Copyright
GenericProperty.Description: The copyright text to accompany this RSS feed.

Info.Name: SmartBlog Blog
Info.Description: The root node for a SmartBlog Blog, under this type of document, you can create posts, dates and rss feeds.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable Global Comments
GenericProperty.Description: Disable global comments on this blog.

Info.Name: Year
Info.Description: Use this type of document to store your posts by date, this is the preferred method of storing posts.

Template.Name: SmartBlogContent
SmartBlogLayout
SmartBlogPage
SmartBlogPost

Stylesheet.Name: Main.SmartBlog
